channel.title: CVE Feed for Google Inc. -- Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google Inc. -- Android

item.title: CVE-2017-0702|2024-09-16T16:37:57.276Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android system ui. Product: Android. Versions: 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-36621442.

item.title: CVE-2014-9955|2024-09-16T16:28:31.557Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in Qualcomm closed source components. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-36384686.

item.title: CVE-2017-13275|2024-09-16T16:14:14.058Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In getVSCoverage of CmapCoverage.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds read due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-70808908.

item.title: CVE-2017-0722|2024-09-16T16:33:10.227Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android media framework (h263 decoder). Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-37660827.

item.title: CVE-2017-0863|2024-09-16T16:27:45.140Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Upstream kernel video driver. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-37950620.

item.title: CVE-2017-13259|2024-09-16T16:37:59.526Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In functionality implemented in sdp_discovery.cc, there are possible out of bounds reads due to missing bounds checks. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-68161546.

item.title: CVE-2018-9361|2024-09-16T16:18:55.966Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In process_l2cap_cmd of l2c_main.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android-6.0 Android-6.0.1 Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android ID: A-74202041.

item.title: CVE-2017-13173|2024-09-16T16:13:41.665Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the MediaTek system server. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID A-28067350. References: M-ALPS02672361.

item.title: CVE-2017-0719|2024-09-16T16:12:40.402Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android media framework (mpeg2 decoder). Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-37273673.

item.title: CVE-2017-13193|2024-09-16T16:49:17.587Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In ihevcd_decode.c there is a possible infinite loop due to bytes for an sps of unsupported resolution resulting in the same sps being fed in over and over. This could lead to a remote denial of service of a critical system process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-65718319.

item.title: CVE-2016-10235|2024-09-16T16:22:28.811Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability in the Qualcomm WiFi driver. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-34390620. References: QC-CR#1046409.

item.title: CVE-2018-9503|2024-09-16T16:22:27.641Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In rfc_process_mx_message of rfc_ts_frames.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9.0 Android ID: A-80432928

item.title: CVE-2017-0820|2024-09-16T16:49:01.135Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A vulnerability in the Android media framework (n/a). Product: Android. Versions: 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0. Android ID: A-62187433.

item.title: CVE-2017-13288|2024-09-16T16:59:05.258Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In writeToParcel and readFromParcel of PeriodicAdvertisingReport.java, there is a permission bypass due to a 64/32bit int mismatch. This could lead to a local escalation of privilege where the user can start an activity with system privileges, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-69634768.

item.title: CVE-2018-9427|2024-09-16T16:28:04.219Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In CopyToOMX of OMXNodeInstance.cpp there is a possible out-of-bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote arbitrary code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android ID: A-77486542.

item.title: CVE-2017-0773|2024-09-16T16:48:38.302Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability in the Android media framework (libhevc). Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0. Android ID: A-37615911.

item.title: CVE-2017-0698|2024-09-16T16:33:46.860Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A information disclosure vulnerability in the Android media framework. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-35467458.

item.title: CVE-2017-13186|2024-09-16T16:24:06.262Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A vulnerability in the Android media framework (libavc) related to incorrect use of mmco parameters. Product: Android. Versions: 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-65735716.

item.title: CVE-2017-0693|2024-09-16T16:39:10.749Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability in the Android media framework. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-36993291.

item.title: CVE-2017-13245|2024-09-16T16:13:43.075Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Upstream kernel audio driver. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. ID: A-64315347.

item.title: CVE-2018-9511|2024-09-16T16:58:51.731Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In ipSecSetEncapSocketOwner of XfrmController.cpp, there is a possible failure to initialize a security feature due to uninitialized data. This could lead to local denial of service of IPsec on sockets with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android-9.0 Android ID: A-111650288

item.title: CVE-2017-0718|2024-09-16T16:39:00.692Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android media framework (mpeg2 decoder). Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-37273547.

item.title: CVE-2017-0846|2024-09-16T16:33:50.625Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Android framework (clipboardservice). Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0. Android ID: A-64934810.

item.title: CVE-2017-13278|2024-09-16T16:28:24.709Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In MediaPlayerService::Client::notify of MediaPlayerService.cpp, there is a possible use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-70546581.

item.title: CVE-2017-13256|2024-09-16T16:34:02.341Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In process_service_search_attr_req of sdp_server.cc, there is an out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-68817966.

item.title: CVE-2016-10234|2024-09-16T16:22:37.142Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Qualcomm IPA driver. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-34390017. References: QC-CR#1069060.

item.title: CVE-2017-6424|2024-09-16T16:48:42.158Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Qualcomm WiFi driver. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-32086742. References: QC-CR#1102648.

item.title: CVE-2017-0825|2024-09-16T16:47:48.466Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Broadcom wifi driver. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-37305633. References: B-V2017063002.

item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Android media framework (aac). Product: Android. Versions: 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-65280786.
